Articles.Content:
KSP won't recognize pods half the time. I've tried deleting pods and replacing them, replacing them with new ones, but spacecraft and aircraft are randomly uncontrollable. Using Infernal Robotics, Infernal Robotics Models or something, Chatterer, and Kerbal Inventory System. I was using MechJeb, deleted that, and then tried deleting KIS. No changes.

![gx6PvhE.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/gx6PvhE.jpg)

Looks like you don't have any crew in your pod, which can happen if your command pod is not the root part. Check that with the Crew button to the left of the craft name.

If that's not the problem, please read the [thread=92229]How to Get Support[/thread] sticky.
Alright, the problem was that there were no available crew members. Thanks!
yeah, if you start with the command pod as the root part, it will automatically be manned.
